title: Platinum/Diamond Tournament Team LF All Roles High-Gold+
body:
**About Team Visage**
We are Team Visage, a set team who is looking for our final 5th member! Remember this is a serious team which will not tolerate children. So if you're looking for a one day team this post isn't for you. If you are interested in joining a real team here's you chance :). Why Join Visage well we provide a relaxed environment for our players to practice in. We have a Teamspeak 3 Server with password locked rooms, and special icons for team only. Visage also provides a personal team coach and manager who are here to help us only focus on playing. If you have read this far put Janna Icon under top 5 champions. Our Partners provide discounts for our players and followers! Our Sponsors are currently Absolute Gaming they provide a teamspeak server and website for us, and pay for any paid tournaments we enter.

**Team Visage's Partners**
NoScope
CinchGaming
Absolute Gaming
NameCheap

**Current Roster**
Coach: Visage Fox
Top: 
Mid:
Jungle: Visage Law
ADC:
Support:

**Schedule**
[All times are in CST]
Monday- Thursday 7:00 - 11:00
Friday-Saturday OFF [Some Saturday will be tournaments] Go4LoL
Sunday 8:00 to Whenever or Tournament [NotSoStock] 
[Please Take 2 minutes out of your day to fill this application if you add me i'll just tell you to fill it out anyways]

**Application**
Name:
Age:
Season 4 Rank:
Season 5 Rank:
Role:
Top 5 Champions:
What are you looking for in a team?
*Note Please Follow us on twitter to support and help us grow*
https://twitter.com/VisageLoL
Thank you All
-Team Visage {{item:3065}}

replies.body:
Name: Spencer
Age: 23
Season 4 Rank: D4
Season 5 Rank: P2 (climbing steadily, was placed low due to a break from the game)
Role: Support
Top 5 Champions: Morgana, Thresh, Blitzcrank, {{champion:40}} , Nami, can play most supports.

What are you looking for in a team? I'm looking for a team that actually analyzes their plan and their gameplay, and focuses on improving as a team rather than demeaning an individual for a personal mistake. (Raging has never been the most effective way to improve.) Ideally, the environment while practicing would be friendly, focused on improving, and so rife with constructive criticism and thoughts on how to play better in the future. The environment during a more serious match or scrim should be positive and focused on coordinating movement as a team, and thinking about the best way to win the game regardless of whether we have a lead or a deficit. I want teammates that can consistently meet the practice schedule in order to put in the necessary time playing as a team. I'm looking for a place where I can grow personally as a player and have a good time playing the game.

Name: Svane Vulfbad
Age: 23
Season 4 Rank: Gold 1
Season 5 Rank: Plat 4
Role: Mid
Top 5 Champions:{{champion:31}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:55}}
{{champion:40}} 
What are you looking for in a team? In all honesty the last bit of season 4 and this season are the first time I have taken ranked and getting better serious, and I would love the chance and ability to become part of a group that can give that environment to become better and grow with a team and show me the mistakes and teach me what I did wrong and how to fix it. Really hope it can be with you guys :]

Name: SHRoyal Cola
Age: 20
Season 4 Rank: D1 89lp 
Season 5 Rank: D5
Role: Top
Top 5 Champions: {{champion:39}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:105}} 
What are you looking for in a team? A fun group of people who can take a joke but when it game time we all play serious thats the major flaw with other teams they take it too relaxed and make dumb mistakes.

Name: MastahYeezus
Age:18
Season 4 Rank:plat 3
Season 5 Rank: plat 2
Role:Top/adc/jg
Top 5 Champions: Top(Trundle, Fizz, Jax, Sion, Kennen) Adc(Kog, Twitch, Corki, Lucian , Sivir) Jg(Trundle, Fizz, Zac, Maokai, Vi)
What are you looking for in a team?A set shot caller with people that are willing  to progress to challenger game play.

Hello, my name is **William Nguyen**, and my in-game name is **the real will**. I recently turned 18 and have been playing League of Legends since the middle of Season 3.

You see this thing here?

> Name:
Age:
Season 4 Rank:
Season 5 Rank:
Role:
Top 5 Champions:
What are you looking for in a team?

Yeah that's your application. I think it's weak and doesn't show much about a player. Filling out this simple application would only show you facts that are pretty much irrelevant. Knowing a person's rank and main champions doesn't tell you anything about that person. Yes, I've read the entire post, here's a Janna icon for you: {{champion:40}} 

As mentioned before, I started playing League of Legends in Season 3, starting off as a top main. I liked off-meta champions at the time such as {{champion:114}}  and {{champion:133}}  (snowballing is fun). However, this only got me to **Silver I**. From here, I decided to learn how to jungle (I never touched the jungle in Season 3), and this help me learn the game. Jungling had helped me learn how the flow of the game works; when to take objectives, when to roam, when to chase, and when to flee. With this knowledge, I skyrocketed to **Platinum III**. After learning the basis of the game, I decided to transfer these skills to toxic champions ({{champion:76}} ,{{champion:105}} ,{{champion:103}} ). These overpowered champions combined with my sense of the game allowed me to reach **Diamond V** just shy of the end of Season 4. However, I do believe this was a slump, as during the pre-season for Season 5, I climbed all the way up to **Diamond II**.

Right now you must be thinking, "Okay, this guy mains top, jungle, *and* mid. What \*\*\*\*ing role role is this guy applying for?" Well you see, I perform well on mages and assassins, but that's only when I'm the leader. This is often not the case in solo queue, so I transitioned to (wait for it) a marksman (seriously, who *actually* uses that word)! As a marksman, I can just play the game and focus on my performance. I can just sit back and follow the calls. I can play the game for fun (and that's what a game is for, right). 

I am very dedicated to teams, and I have been dedicated to previous teams. My previous teams had been quite casual, and I'm hoping for a more competitive environment. I am available between the posted times, but I do take a dinner break between 08:30 - 09:30 (flexible). 

TL;DR - I read your post, I would appreciate it if you read my application.

> [{quoted}](name=the real will,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=Fb39TrOy,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-03-14T04:45:32.289+0000)
>
> Hello, my name is **William Nguyen**, and my in-game name is **the real will**. I recently turned 18 and have been playing League of Legends since the middle of Season 3.
> 
> You see this thing here?

> What are you looking for in a team?
> 
> Yeah that's your application. I think it's weak and doesn't show much about a player. Filling out this simple application would only show you facts that are pretty much irrelevant. Knowing a person's rank and main champions doesn't tell you anything about that person. Yes, I've read the entire post, here's a Janna icon for you: {{champion:40}} 
> 
> As mentioned before, I started playing League of Legends in Season 3, starting off as a top main. I liked off-meta champions at the time such as {{champion:114}}  and {{champion:133}}  (snowballing is fun). However, this only got me to **Silver I**. From here, I decided to learn how to jungle (I never touched the jungle in Season 3), and this help me learn the game. Jungling had helped me learn how the flow of the game works; when to take objectives, when to roam, when to chase, and when to flee. With this knowledge, I skyrocketed to **Platinum III**. After learning the basis of the game, I decided to transfer these skills to toxic champions ({{champion:76}} ,{{champion:105}} ,{{champion:103}} ). These overpowered champions combined with my sense of the game allowed me to reach **Diamond V** just shy of the end of Season 4. However, I do believe this was a slump, as during the pre-season for Season 5, I climbed all the way up to **Diamond II**.
> 
> Right now you must be thinking, "Okay, this guy mains top, jungle, *and* mid. What \*\*\*\*ing role role is this guy applying for?" Well you see, I perform well on mages and assassins, but that's only when I'm the leader. This is often not the case in solo queue, so I transitioned to (wait for it) a marksman (seriously, who *actually* uses that word)! As a marksman, I can just play the game and focus on my performance. I can just sit back and follow the calls. I can play the game for fun (and that's what a game is for, right). 
> 
> I am very dedicated to teams, and I have been dedicated to previous teams. My previous teams had been quite casual, and I'm hoping for a more competitive environment. I am available between the posted times, but I do take a dinner break between 08:30 - 09:30 (flexible). 
> 
> TL;DR - I read your post, I would appreciate it if you read my application.

Thank you for taking the team to read my post, very well written i sent you a friend request.

What are you looking for in a team? I am looking for a team of plat + players who are dedicated to playing consistently in order to get a team to a high rank and also improve individually in a team environment.

Season 4 Rank: Platinum V
Season 5 Rank: Gold IV
Role: Support
Top 5 Champions: Leona, Nami, Thresh, Sona, and Bard ( i know how to play him), and i can also play all other support champions at a decent level
What are you looking for in a team? A team that makes all practices and strives to improve as a team and enjoy the game. People that are committed and are ok with being criticized.

Name: adam
Age: 16
Season 4 Rank: n/a(can explain)
Season 5 Rank: Plat 3
Role: Role
Top 5 Champions: {{champion:40}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:29}} 
What are you looking for in a team? I want to gain more tournament experience as well as have a dedicated set of people who wont flake when things get rough. :^)
If you add us and ask us any questions you wont get a tryout sorry but it shouldnt be too hard to read considering you read every day

Hello guys coach Fox of Visage reminding you to READ the full post and not just message us in game if you do we will refer you back to this post We want fully committed players who wont 1. screw around and whine 2. Take practice serious (its not the place to tryout your new champs or etc.) 3. people who will make practices 4. Not quit practice after a loss.

Steven
22
Diamond 4
Diamond 5
Support
Braum/Soraka/{{champion:40}} /Lulu/Morgana/Velkoz/Annie/etc. (Any Support)
I currently play for CSL UWindsor and EGEOfficial. (Only Semi Pro)
Looking to expand my knowledge with different play styles. Also the free rp is always nice from tournament winnings.
Either respond in a reply or add my Smurf (Juggernaut Braum). Thanks for your time
